name: Block Puzzle: Star Finder
description:
Easy to begin, yet challenging to master block puzzle game!

Block Puzzle: Star Finder
Fill up the wooden blocks to score high!
Add even more excitement to the puzzle game by enabling block rotation with stars!
Block Puzzle: Star Finder is a simple, classic puzzle game that can be enjoyed by everyone in the family!

HOW TO PLAY
1. Simply drag the given blocks and put them into the grid
2. Remove the blocks by making full horizontal or vertical lines!
3. You can rotate the blocks by charging the booster gauge!
4. Try to remove multiple lines at a time to get higher score :D


FEATURES
• NO WIFI? NO PROBLEM! Enjoy wood puzzle anytime, anywhere!
• FREE TO PLAY & Suitable for all ages.
• NO penalties & time limits; You can enjoy Block Puzzle at your own pace!

STUNNING GRAPHICS
• Catchy sound effects with mesmerizing visuals suitable for everyone

NOTES
• Block Puzzle: Star Finder supports mobile phones & tablet PCs.
• Block Puzzle: Star Finder contains ads varying from banners, interstitials, videos to house ads.
• Block Puzzle: Star Finder is free to play, however, you may purchase Ad Free.
